lyric:
[00:20.500]Once I was seven years old my momma told me
[00:25.040]Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonely
[00:28.430]Once I was seven years old
[00:36.790]It was a big big world, but we thought we were bigger
[00:41.020]Pushing each other to the limits, we were learning quicker
[00:45.060]By eleven smoking herb and drinking burning liquor
[00:49.010]Never rich so we were out to make that steady figure
[00:52.480]Once I was eleven years old my daddy told me
[00:57.020]Go get yourself a wife or you'll be lonely
[01:00.470]Once I was eleven years old
[01:08.910]I always had that dream like my daddy before me
[01:12.730]So I started writing songs, I started writing stories
[01:16.840]Something about the glory, just always seemed to bore me
[01:20.640]Cause only those I really love will ever really know me
[01:24.610]Once I was 20 years old, my story got told
[01:29.270]Before the morning sun, when life was lonely
[01:32.470]Once I was 20 years old
[01:35.970]Lukas Graham!!!
[01:40.870]I only see my goals, I don't believe in failure
[01:44.890]Cause I know the smallest voices, they can make it major
[01:48.720]I got my boys with me at least those in favor
[01:52.810]And if we don't meet before I leave, I hope I'll see you later
[01:56.510]Once I was 20 years old, my story got told
[02:00.820]I was writing about everything, I saw before me
[02:04.440]Once I was 20 years old
[02:12.520]Soon we'll be 30 years old, our songs have been sold
[02:16.810]We've traveled around the world and we're still roaming
[02:20.470]Soon we'll be 30 years old
[02:28.760]I'm still learning about life
[02:30.720]My woman brought children for me
[02:32.680]So I can sing them all my songs
[02:34.620]And I can tell them stories
[02:36.720]Most of my boys are with me
[02:38.460]Some are still out seeking glory
[02:40.710]And some I had to leave behind
[02:42.780]My brother I'm still sorry
[02:44.520]Soon I'll be 60 years old, my daddy got 61
[02:48.930]Remember life and then your life becomes a better one
[02:52.710]I made a man so happy when I wrote a letter once
[02:56.740]I hope my children come and visit, once or twice a month
[03:00.370]Soon I'll be 60 years old, will I think the world is cold
[03:04.700]Or will I have a lot of children who can warm me
[03:08.350]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:16.520]Soon I'll be 60 years old, will I think the world is cold
[03:20.800]Or will I have a lot of children who can warm me
[03:24.450]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:32.430]Once I was seven years old, my momma told me
[03:36.880]Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonely
[03:40.470]Once I was seven years old
[03:48.400]Once I was seven years old
tlyric:
[00:20.500]那年我七岁 妈妈就对我说
[00:25.040]去交些朋友 不然你会孤独寂寞
[00:28.430]那年我七岁
[00:36.790]这个辽阔的大千世界 总以为我们也会变得更加强大
[00:41.020]将彼此逼到绝境 我们得以更快的成长
[00:45.060]十一岁那年 我吸**喝烈性酒
[00:49.010]生活捉襟见肘 我们离家奋斗只为有个稳定收入
[00:52.480]十一岁那年 爸爸对我说
[00:57.020]给自己找个妻子 否则你会空虚寂寞
[01:00.470]那年我十一岁
[01:08.910]我常梦想着有朝一日 能像爸爸一样成为一个歌手
[01:12.730]所以我开始写歌 开始写不同的故事
[01:16.840]曾经的光辉岁月 对我来说也已厌倦
[01:20.640]因为只有那些 我真正爱的人才真的懂我
[01:24.610]二十岁那年 我的故事广为流传
[01:29.270]黎明还未照耀前 孤独的我无人相伴
[01:32.470]那年我二十岁
[01:35.970]Lukas Graham!!!
[01:40.870]我一心实现梦想 从不相信失败
[01:44.890]因为我知道蝼蚁 也能成就不朽
[01:48.720]我找到一群伙伴 跟我志同道合的
[01:52.810]如果我离开前我们无缘碰面 就让我们后会有期
[01:56.510]二十岁那年 我的故事广为流传
[02:00.820]我写下每一个 我亲眼所见的故事
[02:04.440]那年我二十岁
[02:12.520]很快我们三十而立 我们的歌也是人尽皆知
[02:16.810]我们游遍世界 我们不曾止步
[02:20.470]很快我们就三十了
[02:28.760]我依旧在领悟人生真谛
[02:30.720]爱人为我生了几个孩子
[02:32.680]所以我可以为他们唱我的歌
[02:34.620]我可以为他们讲我的故事
[02:36.720]昔日兄弟仍跟有联络
[02:38.460]有些仍在追名逐利
[02:40.710]有些已被我遗忘脑海
[02:42.780]兄弟们我仍心怀歉意
[02:44.520]很快我就到60岁了， 接近父亲61岁去世的年纪了
[02:48.930]时刻感恩 生活就会更加美好
[02:52.710]又一次给老爸写信 他高兴不已
[02:56.740]我希望我的孩子偶尔也来看望一下我
[03:00.370]很快我将年逾六十 不知是否还会觉得人世冷漠
[03:04.700]还是会拥有一群 温暖我心的孩子
[03:08.350]很快我将年逾六十
[03:16.520]很快我将年逾六十 不知是否还会觉得人世冷漠
[03:20.800]还是会拥有一群 温暖我心的孩子
[03:24.450]很快我将年逾六十
[03:32.430]那年我七岁 妈妈就对我说
[03:36.880]去交些朋友 不然你会孤独寂寞
[03:40.470]那年我七岁
[03:48.400]那年我七岁
